law.catch_line: Attorney General may hire independent auditor -- Cost incurred to be included in court costs.

text.section: The Attorney General's office may hire a special independent auditor of choice to do a complete audit of books as to contracts entered into both prior to and after July 13, 1984, to determine compliance with the preneed funeral laws, if the Attorney General determines any discrepancy as a result of an examination by his office.
In any action brought under this chapter in which the Commonwealth prevails, the court shall award cost incurred by the Attorney General for the special independent auditor.

law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1984.
